TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PublicKey extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a certificate's public key information.

span.span: Represents a certificate's public key information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件包含的物件識別碼 () 代表公開金鑰演算法、 ASN 編碼的參數及 (ASN.1） 編碼的金鑰值。The object contains the object identifier () representing the public key algorithm, the ASN-encoded parameters, and the ASN.1-encoded key value. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的公開金鑰物件來加密檔案。The following example demonstrates how to use the public key from a object to encrypt a file. 它也會示範如何使用該憑證的私密金鑰加密的檔案解密。It also shows how to decrypt the encrypted file using the private key for that certificate. [!code-csharp[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[X509Certificate2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509certificate2/vb/program.vb#1)] 下列範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。The following example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Key As AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: Gets an or object representing the public key.

span.span: Gets an or object representing the public key.
An object representing the public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性傳回的公開金鑰。This property returns the public key. 同時和支援的索引鍵。Both and keys are supported. 呼叫這個屬性來取得憑證的公開金鑰。Call this property to obtain a certificate's public key. 重複的呼叫這個屬性會傳回相同的索引鍵。Repeated calls to this property will return the same key. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，並允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, and then allows the user to select one or more certificates. 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。The example then writes certificate information to the console. [!code-cpp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CPP/certselect.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/CS/certselect.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertSelect/VB/certselect.vb#1)]

exception.span: The key algorithm is not supported.

span.span: The key algorithm is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Oid As Oid
public: property System::Security::Cryptography::Oid ^ Oid { System::Security::Cryptography::Oid ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets an object identifier (OID) object of the public key.

span.span: Gets an object identifier (OID) object of the public key.

value.span: 物件識別碼 (OID) 的公開金鑰物件。

span.span: An object identifier (OID) object of the public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件識別碼 (OID) 是可唯一識別物件類別或屬性的數字。An object identifier (OID) is a number that uniquely identifies an object class or attribute. 物件識別碼被以點的十進位字串，例如"1.2.3.4"。An object identifier is represented as a dotted decimal string, such as "1.2.3.4." 物件識別碼會組織成通用的階層。Object identifiers are organized into a global hierarchy. 國家註冊授權單位發出根物件識別元給個人或組織，管理 Oid 分組其根物件識別項之下的階層。National registration authorities issue root object identifiers to individuals or organizations, who manage the hierarchy of OIDs grouped below their root object identifier. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console. [!code-cpp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CPP/certinfo.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/CS/certinfo.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CertInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CertInfo/VB/certinfo.vb#1)]
